title: Hampshire in relegation peril after Surrey defeat, Yorkshire v Durham: county cricket final day – live
summary: James Wallace provides updates on the concluding day of the season's final round. Stay tuned for highlights and key moments as the competition wraps up. Don't miss the latest developments from the event!

title: Labour conference chance to show alternative to ‘toxic divide and decline’ offered by Reform, says Starmer – UK politics live
summary: At the Labour Party conference, the Prime Minister emphasized the event as a significant chance to present their political message to the public. He highlighted the importance of rallying support and articulating the party's vision. The conference aims to strengthen their position ahead of upcoming elections.

title: Brentford v Manchester United: Premier League – live
summary: Ruben Amorim's team seeks to secure back-to-back victories in west London. The match is covered with a minute-by-minute report. Barry Glendenning provides live updates for fans.

title: Ryder Cup 2025: day two – live
summary: Live updates from day two at Bethpage Back cover Europe’s efforts to extend their lead in the competition. The coverage provides hole-by-hole insights as the excitement unfolds. Join our writers for the latest developments.

title: England v Canada: Women’s Rugby World Cup final – live
summary: The Red Roses face Canada at Twickenham for the championship title in a sold-out match. Luke McLaughlin provides minute-by-minute coverage of the game. Fans eagerly await the outcome as the teams vie for the ultimate prize.
